languages.text: "Дитя... погибшего дома? Я не помню тебя. Но мне отрадно, что на пороге смерти я могу лицезреть частичку... Азуриани".

traits.locale_text: "Дитя, я... помню тебя. Ты та, что избрала Путь Изгоя и покинула Крударах, верно? Мне отрадно, что на пороге смерти я могу лицезреть частичку дома в твоем лице, но боюсь, что твои надежды тщетны. Мне нет спасения".
traits.speaker: TheDoorFarseer

languages.text: "A child... of our dead home? I do not remember you. But it gladdens me on the cusp of death to behold a spark... of the Asuryani."
languages.original_text: "Дитя... погибшего дома? Я не помню тебя. Но мне отрадно, что на пороге смерти я могу лицезреть частичку... Азуриани".

traits.locale_text: "A child... of our dead home? I do not remember you. But it warms the arrival of my death to see a spark... of the Asuryani."
traits.speaker: TheDoorFarseer

traits.locale_text: "A child... of our dead home? I do not remember you. But it warms the arrival of my death to see a spark... of the Asuryani."
traits.speaker: TheDoorFarseer

traits.locale_text: "A child... of our dead home? I do not remember you. But it gladdens me on the cusp of death to behold a spark... of the Asuryani."
traits.speaker: TheDoorFarseer

traits.locale_text: "A child... of our dead home? I do not remember you. But it gladdens me on the cusp of death to behold a spark... of the Asuryani."
traits.speaker: TheDoorFarseer

traits.locale_text: "A child... of our dead home? I do not remember you. But it gladdens me on the cusp of death to behold a spark... of the Asuryani."
traits.speaker: TheDoorFarseer

languages.text: “是我们的孩子……来自我们陨落的家园？我不认识你，但在临死前，还能看到……阿苏焉子嗣的火种，真是让我喜悦不已。”
languages.original_text: "A child... of our dead home? I do not remember you. But it gladdens me on the cusp of death to behold a spark... of the Asuryani."

traits.locale_text: “是我们的孩子……来自我们陨落的家园？我不认识你，但在临死前，还能看到……阿苏焉子嗣的火种，真是让我喜悦不已。”
traits.speaker: TheDoorFarseer

languages.text: «¿Una niña... de nuestro mundo moribundo? No te recuerdo, pero me alegra presenciar al borde de la muerte una chispa... de los Asuryani».
languages.original_text: "A child... of our dead home? I do not remember you. But it gladdens me on the cusp of death to behold a spark... of the Asuryani."

traits.locale_text: «¿Una niña... de nuestro mundo moribundo? No te recuerdo, pero me alegra presenciar al borde de la muerte una chispa... de los Asuryani».
traits.speaker: TheDoorFarseer

languages.text: "Ein Kind ... unserer toten Heimat? Ich erinnere mich nicht an Euch. Doch es erfreut mich an der Schwelle des Todes einen Funken ... der Asuryani zu sehen."
languages.original_text: "A child... of our dead home? I do not remember you. But it gladdens me on the cusp of death to behold a spark... of the Asuryani."

traits.locale_text: "Ein Kind ... unserer toten Heimat? Ich erinnere mich nicht an Euch. Doch es erfreut mich an der Schwelle des Todes einen Funken ... der Asuryani zu sehen."
traits.speaker: TheDoorFarseer

languages.text: 「死に絶えた故郷の…子だと？お前のことは記憶にないな。だが死の間際にアシュリヤーニの光を見られるのは…嬉しいものだ」
languages.original_text: "A child... of our dead home? I do not remember you. But it gladdens me on the cusp of death to behold a spark... of the Asuryani."

traits.locale_text: 「死に絶えた故郷の…子だと？お前のことは記憶にないな。だが死の間際にアシュリヤーニの光を見られるのは…嬉しいものだ」
traits.speaker: TheDoorFarseer

languages.text: « Un enfant... Dans notre demeure à l'agonie ? Je ne me souviens pas de vous, mais je me réjouis de pouvoir contempler une étincelle des Asuryanis alors que je suis à l'article de la mort. »
languages.original_text: "A child... of our dead home? I do not remember you. But it gladdens me on the cusp of death to behold a spark... of the Asuryani."

traits.locale_text: « Un enfant... Dans notre demeure à l'agonie ? Je ne me souviens pas de vous, mais je me réjouis de pouvoir contempler une étincelle des Asuryani alors que je suis à l'article de la mort. »
traits.speaker: TheDoorFarseer

languages.text: "Ölü yuvamızın çocuğu... Seni hatırlamıyorum. Ancak ölümün eşiğinde Asuryani ışıltısına şahit olmak beni mutlu etti."
languages.original_text: "A child... of our dead home? I do not remember you. But it gladdens me on the cusp of death to behold a spark... of the Asuryani."

traits.locale_text: "Ölü yuvamızın bir çocuğu mu? Seni hatırlamıyorum. Fakat ölümün eşiğinde bir Asuryani ışıltısına şahit olmak beni mutlu etti."
traits.speaker: TheDoorFarseer
